DataElement.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Superior Gluteal Artery Flap Performed Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record information related to breast reconstruction using a superior gluteal artery flap.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Superior Gluteal Artery Flap Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Surgery to rebuild the shape of the breast after a mastectomy._Either of two (superior or inferior) arteries branching from the internal iliac artery in the hip joint and gluteal region._A unit of tissue that is transferred from one site to another while maintaining its own blood supply._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Mammoplasty Superior Gluteal Artery Flap Performed

Concepts.definition: Either of two (superior or inferior) arteries branching from the internal iliac artery in the hip joint and gluteal region.
A unit of tissue that is transferred from one site to another while maintaining its own blood supply.
Executed and carried through to completion.
